resources.string: Please fill group name and ID
How did you know about this app?
Please answer few simple questions before watching this video.
Let us see, what you have learnt from this video.
Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
Pradhan Mantri Jan Suraksha Bima Yojana
Security Features of Rs.500 and Rs.2000
How to Operate a Bank a/c
ATM Debit Card - Fraud and Prevention

string-array.name: before_questions
string-array.item: I find it more satisfying to spend money than to save it for the long term.
I pay my utility bills (e.g. electricity, LPG, post paid mobile bills) on time
I tend to live for today and let tomorrow take care of itself.
I find it more satisfying to spend money than to save it for the long term.
I only buy things which I can afford.
We should firstly meet our needs (essential to life) and then to our wants (branded dress, car, etc.)
I don\'t have money to save.
Savings is not something that I need to do.
We should start with small amount.
We should start saving at an early age.
Which documents are considered valid KYC for availing loan?
Take as much loan as you can repay on time.
How should the loan taken from MFI be used for___
The repayment of loan should be made out of__
Insurance is not required for me and for my family.
Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY) is a kind of:
Is there any sum assured under the Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana?
Pension is only for those who generate surplus income.
I share my ATM pin with friends and family members.
Can banking transaction be performed using Aadhaar No.?
Can you perform banking transaction using simple mobile phone?
Can banking transaction be performed using BHIM?
RuPay card can be used to make payment at___
I or any of my family member use the e-wallet.
We should check for ATM card cloning device within the ATM slot when using ATM machine?
Should we share PIN No. with bank\'s guard or someone standing outside the ATM?
I know whom to report in the case of misbehaviour by financial institution officials.
If I report about the misbehaviour of the MFI staff, this may negatively affect my chance of getting loan in future from the MFI.
I know how to identify fake Indian currency notes.
Who is authorised to print currency notes of Rs. 10 and above?
Security threads are found in which currency notes?
What is prohibited from writing on the currency notes?

We should only insure our lives, not our livestock and other properties.

Will you share ATM Card details with anyone?

After making the payment through POS, what should you get back from the POS holder?
For using e-wallet facility, the following is required:
